string-array.name: badge_consistency_desc
string-array.item: You have started a consistency streak! Keep it up!
You have watered your plants 10 times in a row!
You have watered your plants 100 times in a row!
You have watered your plants 1000 times in a row!
You have watered your plants 10000 times in a row! Now that\'s dedication!

string-array.name: badge_diversity_desc
string-array.item: You own 2 unique types of plants! Diversify your garden!
You own 4 unique types of plants!
You own 6 unique types of plants!
You own 8 unique types of plants!
You own 10 unique types of plants!
You own 12 unique types of plants! So much diversity!

string-array.name: badge_photographer_desc
string-array.item: You have uploaded your first photo! Take and upload more pictures!
You have uploaded your 10000th photo! You\'re a plant photography expert!

string-array.name: badge_greenThumb_desc
string-array.item: You have a green thumb! You cared for your plants for the first time!
You cared for your plants for a total of 10 times!
You cared for your plants for a total of 100 times!
You cared for your plants for a total of 1000 times!
You cared for your plants for a total of 10000 times! Gardening extraordinaire!

string-array.name: badge_ofBadges_desc
string-array.item: A badge collector in the making! You have collected a total of 5 other badges!
You have collected a total of 10 other badges!
You have collected a total of 20 other badges! What a collection!
